data.text: «Mixi mu nɔma a ra,
Xa mixi mu suusama a ya ra,
Nde n donixi se nde ra n naxan nagbilenma a ma?
N mu nɔma dundude na sɔɲɛ xa fe ma,
A bura fɛɛrɛ na nde bɛ?
Nde nɔma a dɛ rabide?
Xalee fatuxi a kiri ma alɔ sɔɔri xa wure lefa,
e xɛtɛnxi e bore ra,
e fatuxi e bore ma a fanyi ra.
A na ɲɛngi sɛnbɛ ra,
Tɛ yiriyiri minima a dɛ i,
Tuuri nde minima a ɲɔɛ,
A ɲɛngi findima tɛ ra,
Sɛnbɛ xutunxi a kɔnyi ra,
A kiri xɔrɔxɔ, a sɛnbɛ gbo.
A kanke luxi alɔ gɛmɛ xungbe.
A na ti, limaniya bama nɛ sɛnbɛmae yi ra,
Santidɛgɛma na din a ra,
Wure luxi nɛ a bɛ alɔ sɛxɛ,
A mu gaaxuma tanbɛe ya ra,
Gbendegela luma a bɛ alɔ sɛxɛ,
Bɛlɛ xɛɲɛnxi nde nun tunbee na a furi bunyi,
A baa ixufuxufuma alɔ ye nɛ satunma,
A na a ɲɛrɛ ye xɔɔra,
Mangɛ yo mu a bɛ duniɲa,
A a ya ragoroma nɛ daalise yɛtɛ igboe ma,
